root.name: Archangel
root.description: OverviewArchangel is a hybrid action/roleplaying game that was developed by Metropolis Software and published by Fishtank Interactive (In the US) and JoWood Productions (In the UK) for the PC in 2002.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XPProcessor: Pentium 3 @ 600 MHzMemory: 128 MBHard Drive: 500 MB FreeVideo Memory: 16 MBSound Card: Soundblaster CompatibleRecommendedOS: Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XPProcessor: Pentium 4 @ 1 GHzMemory: 256 MBHard Drive: 700 MB FreeVideo Memory: 32 MBSound Card: Soundblaster Compatible
